t: I could use some help deciding on which water filter to buy. - High Sierra Topix
s: You can pre-soak a filter element, but that means that you will be carrying excess water weight. I use two Platypus 2L bags. One is marked "RAW", and the other one is unmarked. At the stream, first I have to scoop up some water. I have an old 2L bag with a leak, so I cut off the leaky end and used the rest of it as a water scoop. Then I pour that into the RAW bag. I string it up to a tree branch, and gravity causes it to drain ...
